name: agentscript
description: Minimalist Agent Based Modeling (ABM) framework based on NetLogo
author: Owen Densmore

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run minify && npm run docs
scripts.build:agentscript: cat src/util.coffee src/evented.coffee src/color.coffee src/colormaps.coffee src/colormixin.coffee src/shapes.coffee src/agentset.coffee src/patch.coffee src/patches.coffee src/turtle.coffee src/turtles.coffee src/link.coffee src/links.coffee src/animator.coffee src/model.coffee | coffee -cs > lib/agentscript.js
scripts.build:extras: coffee -co lib/ extras/*.coffee && cp extras/*.js lib/
scripts.build: npm run build:agentscript && npm run build:extras
scripts.minify: for file in agentscript algorithm as.dat.gui data data.tile fbui mouse nlmouse rgbtohsl; do uglifyjs lib/$file.js > lib/$file.min.js; done;
scripts.docs: docco -o docs/ src/* && docco -o docs/ extras/*
scripts.watch: npm run watch:agentscript && npm run watch:extras
scripts.git-diff: git diff LICENSE README.md package.json src extras models sketches
scripts.git-prep: git checkout master && npm run all && git add . && git status
scripts.git-commit: git checkout master && git commit -v && git push origin master
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
